roleset.name: causing shame

example.name: arg 0 and argMs
example.text: I have seen him on several occasions give answers which show that he has no real understanding of the underlying issue at all , and several which are really just embarrassing .

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: Bogart was "embarrassing" with his over-acted insanity

example.name: empty it, args 0,1
example.text: While not publicly embarrassing, it was embarrassing to me that I had to go climb a tree to get away.
example.arg: that I had to go climb a tree to get away

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, embarrass-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1.
